definitions.definition: The study of the past by excavation and analysis of its material remains.

subdefinitions.definition: The actual excavation , examination , analysis , and interpretation .
examples: The building's developers have asked for some archaeology to be undertaken.

subdefinitions.definition: The actual remains together with their location in the stratigraphy .
examples: The archaeology will tell us which methods of burial were used by the Ancient Greeks.

subdefinitions.definition: The academic subject; in the USA: one of the four sub-disciplines of anthropology .
examples: She studied archaeology at Edinburgh University.

main_definition: The study of the past by excavation and analysis of its material remains.
